column4: i have an atheros wifi card which need ath5k... I installed it, i see the card in iwlist but scanning for networks doesn't work. maybe our problems are related
iwlist wlan0 scanning returns "no scan results" so i think it's not network manager
im sorry i've never dealt with atheros
can u pastebin the output of lspci so that i know what card it is exactly
oh cool. the fix is easy then
you saved the file after you added that right?
ok on the terminal. type sudo rmmod ath_pci
and Evilrick : THX a LOT for your help... I'll try to investigate on what i did for it to work. I don't beleive in magic
it was blacklist. I remember cause i was setting ath on someone's eeepc and thats all it takes to make it work on intrepid.
